build-ios.description: Build and sign a standalone IPA for the Apple App Store

build-android.description: Build and sign a standalone APK or App Bundle for the Google Play Store

build-web.description: Build the web app for production

build-status.description: Get the status of the latest build for the project

run.description: Run the Android app binary locally or run the iOS app binary locally

start.description: Start a local dev server for the app or start a Webpack dev server for the web app

sync-deps.description: Syncs dependencies to package.json (required for autolinking).

ensure-symlink.description: Ensure workspace node_modules is symlink under app's node_modules folder.
